Token.Abstract: Class with the methods for request to the Spree store.
Method to send a request to the Spree store.
Token.Declaration: + (void)sendData:(NSMutableDictionary *)data toService:(NSString *)service withMethod:(NSString *)method isTesting:(BOOL)testing withAccessToken:(NSString *)accessToken isAccessTokenInHeader:(BOOL)isInHeader toCallback:(void ( ^ ) ( id ))callback

Parameter.Name: data
Parameter.Abstract: Dictionary with the data to be sended.

Parameter.Name: service
Parameter.Abstract: The name of the endpoint of the Spree store.

Parameter.Name: method
Parameter.Abstract: If the request is GET or POST.

Parameter.Name: testing
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to define is the request will be send to the testing server.

Parameter.Name: isInHeader
Parameter.Abstract: Flag to define if the accessToken will be sended in the header or in the boy of the request.

Token.Abstract: A special request to get the current menu from the Spree store.
